title: Predict: Identify Underfitting
story: Model complexity affects performance. Too simple = underfitting (both train and test poor). Too complex = overfitting (great train, poor test).
instructions: Which scenario shows underfitting? Print 1 or 2. Scenario 1: train=0.95, test=0.92. Scenario 2: train=0.6, test=0.58.
starterCode:
# Scenario 1: train=0.95, test=0.92 (good fit, both high)
# Scenario 2: train=0.6, test=0.58 (underfitting, both low)

# Underfitting = model too simple, both scores low
print(2)

tests.expectedBehavior: Identify underfitting from low train and test

hints.text: Underfitting: model can't even fit training data well. Both scores low.
Scenario 1: good generalization. Scenario 2: model too simple (underfitting).
